snippet: Lawyers involved in longstanding litigation with the Police Department want to see if rules established by a judge were broken.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers involved in longstanding litigation with the Police Department want to see if rules established by a judge were broken.

headline.main: Judge Is Asked to Allow Review of Police Dept. Monitoring of Muslim Communities
headline.print_headline: Judge Is Asked to Allow Review of Police Dept. Monitoring of Muslim Communities
headline.seo: Review of N.Y.P.D. Monitoring of Muslim Communities Is Sought
